review: My family and I "cut the cable cord" three and a half years ago.  We have owned a couple Roku products in that time.  Amazon Fire TV is significantly faster and more responsive than its Roku counterpart.  Some reviews claim Roku has more content, which it does, but that content is mostly unwatchable and unnecessary.  My family and I get our television viewing predominantly from Prime, Netflix, Hulu, Vevo and WatchESPN.This product is terrific!
